huobi.Description:
Huobi is one of the world’s largest digital asset trading and management service providers.
The Huobi service offers a wider variety of token options and giveaways to American audiences, with 24/7 personal customer support, and unparalleled security.

mining.Description:
Cryptocurrency mining is the validation of transactions on the blockchain. Once validated, these transactions are added to the blockchain's public ledger of past transactions.
For this effort, successful miners receive new cryptocurrency as a reward.
